author: jwoolley
msg: Changing *any* default behavior is a bad idea without _very_ careful
consideration, IMO, as it can silently break existing configs.  Principle
of least astonishment applies.  Besides, the security argument is bubkus.
Security through obscurity at best, and hardly even that.

author: brianp
msg: Added my vote on minimal server version reporting

author: ianh
msg: vote:change default config so that we only report our version instead

author: bnicholes
msg: Fixed how the NetWare import and exports lists are accessed by the make files.
